short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your RGB journey as a Lightning strike.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitlight Wallet is a cutting-edge solution for seamless Bitcoin and RGB transactions. As the first wallet to integrate RGB Protocol version 0.11, it offers advanced features like Taproot for enhanced privacy. This non-custodial wallet ensures full control over your assets, directly within an intuitive interface. Experience a new era of digital finance with unparalleled security and efficiency.

Explore the source code or contribute to its development on GitHub: https://github.com/bitlightlabs
